snippet.title: Five Nights At Old Toy Factory 2020
snippet.description:
Play online: https://danygames.com/play/adventure/five-nights-at-old-toy-factory-2020.html/

Help Poison Games work more efficiently, check this link https://gogetfunding.com/one-cup-of-coffee-so-i-can-work-more-easily/
Android Download: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.PoisonGames.FNAOTF2020

You are working as a night guard at the old toy factory.
Some strange stuff is happening over night.
Explore and stay alive. Find clues to what is going on here.
Your shift starts at 00h ( midnight ) and ends at 06h.
The only thing you need is to survive. How hard can it be ?

Features:
* Four scary LIVE toys
* Four weapons: Three melee and one ranged
  - bottle
  - leadpipe
  - hammer
  - glock 17
* Classic looking game from Posion Games
* Easy controls
